theme: Night janitor's secret $200/week side hustle using office building TVs after hours

avatar_style.persona: Rebellious, street-smart character who discovered underground money-making method
avatar_style.wardrobe: Casual, relatable clothing that signals 'regular person who cracked the code'
avatar_style.setting: Gritty, authentic workplace setting - dim lighting, real environment not staged

script.speaker: host
script.line: SHOCKING: I made an extra $247 last week. From *their* TVs. After hours.
script.broll_cue: Host secretly counting cash in dimly lit office, TV glowing behind them with corporate logo

script.speaker: host
script.line: A few months ago, I was barely making rent, scrubbing floors 'til 3 AM. This side hustle changed everything.
script.broll_cue: Authentic struggle shots: tired host cleaning, empty wallet, bleak environment

script.speaker: host
script.line: It started with a dead screen in the lobby. I found this app, Trillboards. It turns any dormant TV into a money-making machine for local businesses.
script.broll_cue: Host subtly pulls out phone, opens Trillboards app, glances around cautiously. Close-up on app interface.

script.speaker: host
script.line: They think these screens are just dead weight. But they're sitting on unclaimed income opportunities. Your company's not using them... so why not you?
script.broll_cue: Host quickly scans QR code on office TV from Trillboards app, setting up a playlist of local promos. Emphasize stealth and speed.

script.speaker: host
script.line: Now, I'm pulling in an easy $180 to $247 extra every week. My 'job' just became a front for my real hustle. And they have no idea.
script.broll_cue: Host shows Trillboards earnings dashboard on phone ($180, $210, $247 visible as weekly totals), then discreetly adds more cash to wad. Satisfied smirk.

script.speaker: host
script.line: This only works if you have access to TVs – in a restaurant, a gym, a lobby. But if you do... what are you waiting for? Time to reclaim what's yours.
script.broll_cue: Host winks at camera, walks away confidently with cleaning cart, TV in background cycling through new local promos. Fade to final text.

caption_overlay.text: YOUR BOSS WON'T TELL YOU THIS

trillboards_touchpoints.why_it_helps: Trillboards turns *their* dead screens into *your* ATM.

trillboards_touchpoints.action: QR code scan on workplace TV
trillboards_touchpoints.why_it_helps: Takes 30 seconds to set up passive income.
Proof of concept with real numbers: $180, $210, $247 this week.

metrics_hypothesis.shareability_notes: Controversial angle + specific money claims + FOMO

alt_hooks: I made $XXX this month and my boss is clueless
This side hustle only works if you have TV access
Your workplace is sitting on money and doesn't know it

rights_and_clearance_notes: Edgy but legal content - focus on legitimate unused screen monetization

scene_breakdown.prompt_text: Dramatic close-up of a night janitor in a dimly lit office building, secretly counting a wad of cash with a knowing, excited expression. A large, corporate TV screen glows with an idle company logo in the background. Cut to quick, gritty shots of the janitor looking exhausted while mopping, then showing an empty wallet, emphasizing their struggle.
scene_breakdown.continuity_notes: Establish the underground/secret money-making vibe and struggle with dramatic lighting and quick cuts.
scene_breakdown.camera_instruction: Close-up handheld style, slight shake for authenticity. Quick cuts for struggle montage.
scene_breakdown.lighting_notes: Dim, dramatic lighting with TV glow.

scene_breakdown.prompt_text: Continuing from last frame, the janitor looks around cautiously, then pulls out a phone, discreetly opening the Trillboards app. Emphasize the casual, hidden nature of the phone interaction, possibly an over-shoulder shot of the app screen.
scene_breakdown.continuity_notes: Maintain secretive atmosphere and character, transition to showing the method.
scene_breakdown.camera_instruction: Over shoulder shot of phone screen, quick glances around the room.
scene_breakdown.lighting_notes: Same dim lighting with phone screen glow.

scene_breakdown.prompt_text: The janitor quickly approaches a large, idle TV screen in the office lobby. The screen flickers to show a Trillboards QR code, which the janitor swiftly scans with their phone, constantly glancing over their shoulder for any onlookers. The app interface is briefly visible on the phone confirming the scan.
scene_breakdown.continuity_notes: Build tension of secret operation, show the core interaction.
scene_breakdown.camera_instruction: Quick cuts between phone and TV screen, focus on the scanning action.
scene_breakdown.lighting_notes: TV brightness illuminates face dramatically during QR code display.

scene_breakdown.prompt_text: The office TV screen now dynamically transforms, displaying various local promos and ads scheduled through Trillboards. The janitor steps back, a satisfied, almost defiant smile playing on their lips, watching the screen operate autonomously. Cut to a close-up of the Trillboards app on the phone, showing an earnings dashboard with clear weekly totals: $180, $210, $247, emphasizing growth.
scene_breakdown.continuity_notes: Show the method working and the direct results.
scene_breakdown.camera_instruction: Wide shot showing full TV and person, then close-up on phone screen for earnings reveal.
scene_breakdown.lighting_notes: Brighter as TV content illuminates space, phone screen brightness on face for reveal.

scene_breakdown.prompt_text: Continuing from the earnings display, the janitor winks directly at the camera, then pockets their wad of cash. They push their cleaning cart away, fading into the dimly lit hallway, leaving the TV screen behind, still actively displaying the Trillboards content. The last shot is the TV, then fading to a final text overlay with a call to action.
scene_breakdown.continuity_notes: Reveal the payoff and success, end with a strong CTA.
scene_breakdown.camera_instruction: Close-up on face for wink, then wider shot of janitor leaving, final fade to text.
scene_breakdown.lighting_notes: Dim hallway lighting, TV glow remains.
